mapper.sql: select id, parent_id, name, url, code, type, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from db_house.acl_permission
mapper.select: select distinct c.* from db_house.acl_admin_role a inner join db_house.acl_role_permission b on b.role_id = a.role_id inner join db_house.acl_permission c on c.id = b.permission_id where a.admin_id = #{adminId} and c.type = 1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 order by c.sort

select distinct c.code from db_house.acl_admin_role a inner join db_house.acl_role_permission b on b.role_id = a.role_id inner join db_house.acl_permission c on c.id = b.permission_id where a.admin_id = #{adminId} and c.type = 2 and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into db_house.acl_permission(parent_id, name, url, code, sort) values(#{parentId},#{name},#{url},#{code},#{sort})
mapper.update: update db_house.acl_permission set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{id}
update db_house.acl_permission set parent_Id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, url = #{url}, code = #{code}, type = #{type}, sort = #{sort}, where id = #{id};
